TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1271

barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1271

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Statement of account.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*Statement of a Settlement made with *person_mentioned*Mr Raleigh*/person_mentioned* for seven Hogs.*/p*
*p*7 Hogs a 23$_________________________________________________ $161.—*/p*
*p*Amt *person_mentioned*Mr Furnash*/person_mentioned*'s note________________________________$127. 50*/p*
*p*" note for Stamp paper $3.50—equal in property to_____ 5.25*/p*
*p*" Domestic purchased from *person_mentioned*Kerr*/person_mentioned*_____________________ 12. 00*/p*
*p*" paid for ferriage in cash 25¢ equal to_______________ 37 1/2*/p*
*p*-------------145—12 1/2*/p*
*p*Amt. due *person_mentioned*Mr Furnash*/person_mentioned* in property—_______________________ $15. 87 1/2*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="03-07-1826">March 7—1826*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p* */div1*
